props.name: active
props.description: Defines a tab as the current display tab

props.name: effect
props.description: Applies ripple click effect to tab links

props.name: fixedTabs
props.description: Uses fixed tabs instead of the default tabs

props.name: noIconText
props.description: Hides the tab text in custom icon

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the tabs text and can contain HTML

events.name: switched
events.description: Dispatched when the active tab is changed
